short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Encrypt and decrypt emails in Gmail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension's aim is to enhance security in online communication. AES, a cipher that is considered one of the most secure, will be used to encrypt and decrypt messages. In addition, the key can be encrypted and decrypted using the Diffie-Hellman cipher, which eliminates the need for previous contact with the other communication member. Moreover, it is possible to generate a random one-use key and a pair of public and private keys.
